医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
詹姆斯·吉尔博士关于应对全球抗菌素耐药性危机的见解华威大学临床讲师兼执业全科医生 James Gill 博士将参加周一（4 月 29 日）在上议院举办的一场重要活动，该活动的重点是应对全球抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Dr-James-Gills-insights-on-combating-the-global-crisis-of-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Dr-James-Gills-insights-on-combating-the-global-crisis-of-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bebed6b4-aa89-40c6-977c-1e6f3599c1cb Sat, 27 Apr 2024 01:42:51 -0400 Dr. James Gill's insights on combating the global crisis of antimicrobial resistance
血液测试可在出现膝骨关节炎症状前八年预测出该病杜克大学健康中心的研究人员报告说，在 X 光片上出现明显的疾病症状之前至少八年，一项血液测试就成功预测了膝骨关节炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Blood-test-predicts-knee-osteoarthritis-eight-years-before-tell-tale-signs-of-the-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Blood-test-predicts-knee-osteoarthritis-eight-years-before-tell-tale-signs-of-the-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=249ba9d5-44f5-4ae7-828f-9708484fd391 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 20:44:00 -0400 Blood test predicts knee osteoarthritis eight years before tell-tale signs of the disease
新的成像技术可以更仔细地观察原纤维组件圣路易斯华盛顿大学的工程师开发了一种新的成像技术，可以让科学家更仔细地观察原纤维组装体，即β淀粉样蛋白等肽的堆积，这些肽与阿尔茨海默氏病最相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/New-imaging-technique-provides-a-much-closer-look-at-fibril-assemblies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/New-imaging-technique-provides-a-much-closer-look-at-fibril-assemblies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc7a29cf-d48a-4ed7-8308-9f241ad82eaa Fri, 26 Apr 2024 20:37:00 -0400 New imaging technique provides a much closer look at fibril assemblies
俄亥俄州立大学的研究揭示了细菌针对噬菌体的防御机制细菌成功的众多秘密之一是它们有能力保护自己免受病毒（称为噬菌体）的侵害，这种病毒会感染细菌并利用其细胞机制来复制自身。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Ohio-State-study-reveals-bacterial-defense-mechanism-against-phages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Ohio-State-study-reveals-bacterial-defense-mechanism-against-phages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e45daa0f-4195-4fa4-9964-4a435552dcc1 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 20:23:00 -0400 Ohio State study reveals bacterial defense mechanism against phages
甜蜜的成功：UNICAMP 研究人员用大豆和大米蛋白生产纯素冰淇淋由于消费者对原材料来源和加工过程的环境可持续性的认识和要求不断提高，植物性食品在全世界范围内赢得了支持者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Sweet-success-UNICAMP-researchers-product-vegan-ice-cream-with-soy-and-rice- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Sweet-success-UNICAMP-researchers-product-vegan-ice-cream-with-soy-and-rice- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d8162c0-ce65-44b9-a703-b07c7dd0d512 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 20:15:00 -0400 Sweet success: UNICAMP researchers produce vegan ice cream with soy and rice protein
美国无证拉丁裔急诊患者的疫苗接种率相同加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的一项新研究发现，对于在大流行期间到急诊室寻求治疗的无证拉丁裔患者来说，报告的 COVID-19 疫苗接种率与美国公民相同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/UCLA-study-Equal-vaccination-rates-found-among-undocumented-Latinx-ER-病人-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/UCLA-study-Equal-vaccination-rates-found-among-undocumented-Latinx-ER-病人-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d51cbdee-ce0b-4539-9c97-5e1e7305e03d Fri, 26 Apr 2024 20:08:00 -0400 Equal vaccination rates found among undocumented Latinx ER patients in the U.S.
研究表明，小鼠在认知任务中表现出策略行为老鼠足够聪明，有策略吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Mice-demonstrate-strategic-behavior-in-cognitive-tasks-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Mice-demonstrate-strategic-behavior-in-cognitive-tasks-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a20665a-c799-468a-8a69-d8aafc9e6238 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 19:59:00 -0400 Mice demonstrate strategic behavior in cognitive tasks, study reveals
研究：急诊科患者普遍存在住房不安全感根据发表在 JAMA Network Open 上的范德比尔特大学医学中心 (VUMC) 的一项研究，在东南部主要医疗中心的急诊科就诊的患者中，每 20 名患者中就有 1 名面临住房不安全的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Study-Housing-insecurity-prevalent-among-emergency-department-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Study-Housing-insecurity-prevalent-among-emergency-department-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=692ad333-28ec-4bd8-b81e-9b6f430f354b Fri, 26 Apr 2024 19:53:00 -0400 Study: Housing insecurity prevalent among emergency department patients
Medscape 同意取消烟草业资助的戒烟课程英国医学杂志 (BMJ) 和 The Examination 发现，医学教育提供商 Medscape 迫于压力，同意永久取消一系列由烟草业巨头菲利普莫里斯国际公司 (PMI) 资助的经认可的戒烟医学教育课程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Medscape-agrees-to-remove-tobacco-industry-funded-smoking-cessation-courses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Medscape-agrees-to-remove-tobacco-industry-funded-smoking-cessation-courses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67f44f3d-76a1-440a-8708-8cd1c17e4f6d Fri, 26 Apr 2024 19:47:00 -0400 Medscape agrees to remove tobacco-industry funded smoking cessation courses
BRCA1 和 BRCA2 携带者的最大规模研究完善了亚洲人群的癌症风险估计由来自诺丁汉大学（马来西亚校区）、新加坡国家癌症中心 (NCCS)、马来西亚癌症研究中心、新加坡南洋理工大学 (NTU Singapore)、马来亚大学、剑桥大学的临床医生和科学家组成的团队* STAR 的新加坡基因组研究所 (GIS) 和其他机构对亚洲人群中的 BRCA1 和 BRCA2（乳腺癌基因 1 和 2）携带者进行了迄今为止最大规模的研究，并对该人群进行了精确的乳腺癌和卵巢癌风险估计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Largest-study-of-BRCA1-and-BRCA2-carriers-refines-cancer-risk-estimates-in-Asian-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Largest-study-of-BRCA1-and-BRCA2-carriers-refines-cancer-risk-estimates-in-Asian-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b475d457-97a0-45fd-94f7-295ea72af331 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 19:40:00 -0400 Largest study of BRCA1 and BRCA2 carriers refines cancer risk estimates in Asian population
